name: Cozy_Comali
description:
Winter has been swallowed up by EVIL! 

They are the main DEVIL!

Winter Spirits have tuned against US!

This is SUS!

The Weather is freezing COLD!  

But only one among us, is BOLD!

Christmas, the season of being cozy with gifts, is at STAKE, 

But the Avengers are taking a BREAK.

It's all up to Comali to save Christmas. 

 A Game made with Python and Pygame.
